lead_paragraph: Eight employees of a Cancun strip club were killed early Tuesday when a group of men threw Molotov cocktails into the building in a working-class area not frequented by tourists.
snippet: Eight employees of a Cancun strip club were killed early Tuesday when a group of men threw Molotov cocktails into the building in a working-class area not frequented by tourists.

headline.main: Mexico: 8 Workers Killed in Attack on Strip Club
headline.print_headline: Mexico: 8 Workers Killed In Attack On Strip Club
